alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 3:06PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla and southeastern Leon Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 306 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tallahassee Community College, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida A and M, Wakulla, Lake Bradford, Newport, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Walker Ford Community Center, South City, Eight Mile Pond, Callen Neighborhood, Bethel, Tallahassee Regional A/P, Natural Bridge, Springsax Park, Apalachee Ridge Estates, Indian Head Acres and Messer Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
